alert.note: Alert for Ashtabula Inland; Ashtabula Lakeshore; Geauga; Lake (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 20 at 8:49AM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...An intense lake effect snow band will affect northeastern Geauga...Lake and northern Ashtabula Counties Until 945 AM EST.... At 848 AM EST, radar indicated an intense lake effect snow band along a line extending from 7 miles north of Geneva-On-The-Lake to 7 miles east of Geneva, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARDS INCLUDE... Visibility rapidly dropping to less than a quarter of a mile... Locations impacted include... Painesville, Ashtabula, Chardon, Fairport Harbor, Geneva-On-The-Lake, Mentor, Geneva, Madison, Perry, Mentor-On-The-Lake, Austinburg, Montville, North Perry, Thompson, Rock Creek, Grand River, Aquilla, Edgewood, Plymouth Center and North Madison. Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this lake effect snow band. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads are likely to lead to accidents. Consider delaying travel until this snow band passes your location. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/cle and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely. && ODOT DMS 315, 326, 331, and 332.
